quotes.quote: Teams are successful when they are focused, have a short cycle time, and are supported by the executives.
Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
Teams are not ends in themselves; they are a means by which to achieve other organizational goals.
quotes.cite: Richard Wellins, William Byham, Jeanne Wilson

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
All are one unless and until they are asked to work together to achieve a noble goal one.
On our own, we are marshmallows and dried spaghetti, but together we can become something bigger.
A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others.
Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
A group is a bunch of people in an elevator. A team is a bunch of people in an elevator, but the elevator is broken!
Sometimes being on a team means being humble and putting others first. It has to be about the team and not the individual
Good teams incorporate teamwork into their culture, creating the building blocks for success.
Teams, not individuals, are the fundamental learning unit in modern organizations. This is where the 'rubber stamp meets the road'; unless teams can learn, the organization cannot learn.
One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality.
Great teams do not hold back with one another. They are unafraid to air their dirty laundry. They admit their mistakes, their weaknesses, and their concerns without fear of reprisal.
There is no â€˜I' in team but there is in win.
A successful team is a group of many hands and one mind.
When a gifted team dedicates itself to unselfish trust and combines instinct with boldness and effort, it is ready to climb.
None of us is as smart as all of us.
A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of the others.
With an enthusiastic team you can achieve almost anything.
It is a fact that in the right formation, the lifting power of many wings can achieve twice the distance of any bird flying alone.
If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
What sets apart high-performance teams, however, is the degree of commitment, particularly how deeply committed the members are to one another.
quotes.cite: Jon R. Katzenbach & Douglas K. Smith

quotes.quote: No matter the disappointment, you simply cannot divorce your favorite team.
Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
Individual commitment to a group effort â€“ that's what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
